body:
With all the recent retirements / depressing threads, I taught i'd make a simple and easy to understand topic (GoldieWalrus  <------- xD) where you only need to write a single sentence


This is how it goes! ;P Be creative

> Im such a bad boi that I eat with no fork n.n

Somebody else replies and tries to "out bad boi" the person above

> Im such a bad boi that I didnt wear diapers when I wuz a child u.u



just continue the chain :P
-Venum :D
